abilities.name: Romantic Quest
abilities.description: When played, give target unit +2/+2 and 'When this unit attacks, heal your hero for 2'

abilities.name: Charming Presence
abilities.description: Enemy units with 2 or less attack can't attack this

body.raw:
# Knight of Cups

The romantic knight arrives bearing the grail of emotion and dreams.

*"Follow your heart, for it knows the way."*
